articles.title: Family of U.K. socialite Maxwell voices faith in her innocence - CTV News
articles.description: Members of Ghislaine Maxwell's family say they still believe she is innocent after a New York jury found her guilty of luring teenage girls to be sexually abused by American millionaire Jeffrey Epstein.
articles.content:

articles.title: CDC backs corporate demands to force the sick back to work - WSWS
articles.description: The Biden administration has made clear that preventing Americans from contracting, and dying from, COVID-19 is no longer a goal of public policy.
articles.content: On Monday, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) updated its guidelines for isolation and quarantine times, cutting the recommended isolation period for people infected with COVID-1… [+9339 chars]
